summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of En Tu Sano Juicio take away store. All core functionality working correctly including 9 products with escandallos, menu filtering, cart operations, checkout process, admin dashboard with full management capabilities.
passed_tests: API root endpoint returns correct message
GET /api/products returns all 9 products with correct structure
POST /api/admin/login works with Admin/Admin credentials
GET /api/admin/stats returns dashboard statistics
POST /api/orders creates orders successfully
Home page loads with hero section and navigation
Menu page displays all 9 products correctly
Category filters work (Todos, Bowls, Ensaladas, Wraps)
Search functionality filters products by name/description
Add to cart buttons work - products added to cart successfully
Cart sidebar opens showing items, quantities, and total
Cart allows quantity modification and navigation to checkout
Checkout page loads with complete customer form
Form validation works for required fields
Payment method selection (Stripe/PayPal) functions correctly
Admin login authenticates successfully
Admin dashboard shows correct statistics
Admin Products tab displays all 9 products with management options
Admin Orders tab shows order history with status management
Admin Escandallos tab displays detailed ingredient costs
Dark theme with copper accents implemented correctly
Spanish language interface throughout application
Responsive design works on desktop viewport
